metadata.name: District Court Affidavit
metadata.description: Affidavit template for filing before District Courts, Civil Courts, and Magistrate Courts. Uses standard District Court formatting.

required_fields.label: Deponent Name
required_fields.description: Full legal name of the person making the affidavit

required_fields.label: Deponent Address
required_fields.description: Complete residential address of the deponent
required_fields.example: Village Ramnagar, Post Sadar, District Gorakhpur - 273001

required_fields.label: Deponent Occupation
required_fields.description: Profession or occupation of the deponent

required_fields.label: Statement of Facts
required_fields.description: The facts and statements being affirmed under oath
required_fields.example: 1. I am the plaintiff in the above suit. 2. The disputed property belongs to me as per revenue records.

required_fields.label: Verification Place
required_fields.description: Place where the affidavit is verified and sworn

optional_fields.label: Case Reference
optional_fields.description: Related case number if affidavit is filed in pending proceedings

optional_fields.label: List of Exhibits
optional_fields.description: List of documents attached as exhibits to the affidavit
optional_fields.example: Document No. 1 - Sale Deed, Document No. 2 - Khatauni

template_content:
IN THE COURT OF _______________
AT _______________

CASE NO. _____ OF _____

IN THE MATTER OF:
_______________
... Plaintiff/Applicant

Versus

_______________
... Defendant/Opposite Party

AFFIDAVIT

I, {deponent_name}, S/o, D/o, W/o _______________,
aged about _____ years, {deponent_occupation},
resident of {deponent_address},
do hereby solemnly state on oath as under:

{statement_facts}

VERIFICATION

I, the deponent above-named, do hereby verify that the contents of this affidavit are true to my knowledge and belief.

Verified at {verification_place} on _______________.

DEPONENT

Before me,
NOTARY / OATH COMMISSIONER
